item.title: A Glass Belt to Transform the Rust Belt
item.description: Hidden beneath the cornfields of Northern Illinois is a unique triangle, often compared to the Bermuda Triangle, but with a positive twist. Unlike its infamous counterpart, this triangle doesn’t make things disappear but instead makes poverty, unemployment, and economic decline vanish. It transforms the remnants of the “rust belt” into a technological hub for the information age. This modern marvel comprises a network of fiber optic cables buried alongside three major highways: I-88, I-90, and I-39.
